item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: As controversies pile up, Trump allies increasingly turn on one another
item.description: Members of President Donald Trump’s administration are increasingly feuding as they face an escalating series of controversies

item.title: Pope Francis live updates: Pope’s funeral to be held Saturday
Tesla earnings to show whether anti-Musk backlash damaged bottom line
item.description: Musk's role at the White House set off worldwide protests at Tesla dealerships. Did it affect the automaker's bottom line?

item.title: Pope Francis and Donald Trump clashed for years over treatment of migrants
item.description: Pope Francis clashed with Donald Trump several times over the years, primarily on Trump's immigration policy and rhetoric toward migrants.
